People of #Bristol/Bath/Swindon/Gloucester, can you help us beat #COVID19?  Researchers across the West of England are calling for volunteers to take part in a new COVID-19 #vaccine study. @NorthBristolNHS @crnwestengland 
To find out more visit: https://t.co/8kdtgQ2bXA https://t.co/llxoWwHfF3
